name: Dobblesteen
description:
Dobblesteen is a one-man project mini-puzzler about rolling dice and matching nice!

Spawn dice and match the values that pop up. Some want bigger numbers, others smaller. The closer you can get it, the better!

Explanation:

Use the buttons at the top of the screen to spawn dice. There are 4 types. A 4-die, 6-die, 8-die and 20-die. Select a die by hovering your mouse over it and holding the left mouse button. While holding the die, you can shake it to obtain a value by pressing or holding the right mouse button or space bar. 

Match the dice to the values in the circles. A circle with a + or > needs a value greater or equal to what is shown. A circle with a - or < needs a value smaller or equal to what is shown. A circle with only a number needs a value that matches it exactly.

Clear Circles to earn points. The closer you can get the value, the more points you'll earn!
